about_the_game:
Welcome to XEN, the first momentum fighter, where speed itself is the ultimate combat resource.


Experience the future of fighting - where movement and combat are blended like never before. 

Movement First

Physical speed empowers your attacks and gives you the edge in battles.

Dynamic Abilities

Dash, slash, and soar with unparalleled freedom, using 10 uniquely powerful movements systems like the rocket-like Fire Burst, the devastating Silver Slash, the jet-like Water Pulse, the hook-like Life's Grasp and more.

Versatile Elemental Combat

Attacks can be infused with any of the 10 elements, each with it's own unique properties, strengths and weaknesses.

Multiplayer First

XEN is being developed with optimal net-code as it's main focus and priority, as we see robust networking as the foundation for quality online play.

Wishlist in order to be among the first to experience the future of both movement and combat.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
